meanings.sent1: The teacher carefully made emendations to the student's essay to help them improve.
meanings.sent2: The editor suggested several emendations to enhance the clarity of the article.
meanings.sent3: The emendations to the recipe turned out to be quite amusing, as the dish tasted even better than expected.
meanings.sent4: Her emendations to the garden transformed it into a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The emendations in the book made the story more exciting and engaging.

meanings.definition: Changes made to improve or correct errors in a text.
meanings.sent1: After receiving feedback, the writer implemented necessary emendations to perfect the manuscript.
meanings.sent2: The emendations made by the proofreader significantly enhanced the quality of the document.
meanings.sent3: The emendations to the play script added a humorous twist that delighted the audience.
meanings.sent4: His emendations to the painting brought out its true beauty and depth.
